• Modules
    • Page Banner
    • Three Column CTAs
    • Center Aligned Content
    • Two Half Columns
    • Tooltip Icons
    • Two Thirds Video
    • Promotional Module
    • Compare Table
    • Header and Footer
    • Multi-Image Row
    • Product Visualizer
    • Half Bento Row
    • Bento Grid
    • Hero Bento w/Slides
    • Product Highlight
    • Banner Carousel
    • Pricing Module
    • Template Selector
    • Pop Up Carousel (Book Sizer)
    • Book Animation
    • One Column Form

Hero Bento w/Slides

This is the hero bento module which is two modules, the hero bento and hero slides modules.

      <div class="module  hero-slides" data-controller="heroSlides" data-event-namespace="hero">
  
  <div class="hero-slides__bg-wrap">
    <div class="grid-construct">

      <div class="hero-slides__intro  js-slides-intro">
        <h4 class="hero-slides__intro-heading">There are millions of stories waiting to be told. <br />Tell yours with Blurb.</h4>
        <p class="hero-slides__intro-p">The world’s leading full service self-publishing platform. <br />Built for authors and book-makers of all types—including you.</p>
        <p>
          <a href="#" class="btn  cta  btn--white">Get Started</a>
        </p>
      </div>

      <div class="hero-slides__carousel  js-hero-slides-carousel">
        <div class="hero-slides__item  js-hero-slide-item " data-id="1" data-controller="heroSlides/slideSet">
  <div class="hero-slides__stage-wrap">
    <div class="hero-slides__stage  js-hero-slide-stage">
